person.professionalHeadline: Focused on making work fulfilling for everyone. CEO/CTO of Torre. Founder of Tribe, Bunny Studio, Voice123, and Emma. Author of Remoter.
person.name: Alexander Torrenegra

location.name: 5252 Big Ranch Rd, Napa, CA 94558, USA
location.shortName: California, United States, Napa County, 1005, Napa

person.summaryOfBio:
Iâ€™m the CEO of Torre (http://torre.co), the matching network for work. We make the process of finding work and finding talent humane, transparent, and automated. Torre's long-term goal is to enable everyone to find fulfilling work opportunities. It's a moonshot: we're becoming -to LinkedIn and Indeed- what WhatsApp is to iMessage, and Google is to Yahoo.

Previously, I co-founded and bootstrapped Voice123 (http://voice123.com) in 2002 (the first and largest global marketplace for voice-overs with over 200,000 voice actors and 100,000 buyers), as well as Bunny Studio ( http://bunnystudio.com ) in 2011 (a mission-critical outsourcing solution for creative work), with my wife Tania Zapata. With hundreds of thousands of users, availability in five languages, and team members in 10+ countries, both companies are growing steadily. In 2018 I co-founded Tribe (http://withyourtribe.com), a remote-first video communication platform. 

I hold multiple patents related to the dynamics of two-sides marketplaces, I was honored by MIT with the Innovator Under 35 award in 2012, with the High-Impact Entrepreneur title by Endeavor in 2013, and named Young Global Leader by the World Economic Forum in 2015.

Together, Tania and I have angel-invested in 20+ tech companies. I joined Sony's Shark Tank Colombia as an investor in 2017. In 2018, I co-founded Torrenegra Accelerator (http://torrenegra.com/) a remote, life-long accelerator for bootstrapped entrepreneurs. I've written several practical guides and frameworks: https://medium.com/tag/torrenegra-frameworks/latest
